body: I really liked this one! I prefer an ending where he stays with the two girls, but if I had to choose it would be the senpai without a doubt.
Honestly prefer the childhood friend over that slutty senpai.She seems loyal and honest while senpai is just a thot.Arisa deserve better though
Ah yes, the old "senpai vs childhood friend" rivalry

Good choice mc taking both of them. I'm mad jelous too you got the childhood female friend and your school crush. It ain't gonna be easy doing both. Hope you up to it and it starts with taming them with the snake first, so they watch their tongue and submit to you calling the shots.
The guy kinda remind me of some kind of douchebag. Oh yeah that guy from 'school days'. I thought there is gonna be a bloodbath. Luckily this is hentai or else one of the girl would have stab him.

oh an not JUST because i'm jealous but because i think anyone who treats women this way does not deserve to live. the fact that they accept it is just mindboggling

This has got to be the worst paced and most predictable eromanga that I've ever loved. The story was kinda ok since I've seen those kinds if troupes before especially the part where he fucked both of them because of the competition of "who has the better pussy hole" though despite all that I still enjoyed it even though the story did turned me off a little bit. But I believe that originality doesn't mean shit if your hentai is hot. The art style was ok. But I love the childhood friend design because pixie cutted girls with an aggressive personality are the best. It's a good 6.9/10 and I didn't know I'd enjoyed it as much as I thought I would be. The pacing is really bad though
Childhood friend or a slut. Hm...

@SnooSnoo more importantly that whole scene is off since that is likely Handa's Mother because 1) You don't say ojamashimasu when entering your own place and 2) the mother asks her if she was leaving already which "did I interrupt" wouldn't be the worst localization of that. This one could have definitely used some TLC from an editor, but hey at least someone tried to translate it.

god i wish that were me

Translation is really off.

For example pg15. It is Hiroki's mother who came back. He wasn't up all night thinking but he had erotic dreams. The mom did not say "Did I interrupt?", it was Arisa saying "Sorry for intruding/Ojamashimashita" the usual greeting when you enter someone else's home. Arisa did not have a hard time talking to the mom. She left without Hiroki being able to have a proper talk with her after the sex.

Hiroki said he had to apologize to Amemiya after what happened the previous day, not "I don't wanna see her". The friend asked Hiroki if he wants to go play somewhere on the way home. The friend doesn't say "I'll see you tomorrow", he said "Oh right you are in two clubs". And rather than "I guess I'll get going to the art club", that line is "Aren't we moving classrooms next?"

Who the hell translated this?
Childhood Friend > Pres
